MS MCQs

    Introduction to implementing lambda architecture for IoT solutions - Learn about unstructured data storage

    »

    1. What answer best describes lambda architecture?

      Lambda architecture supports multiple outputs from a message data source. Typically, a real-time stream for quick analysis, and batch processing for bulk operations.

      Lambda architecture prioritizes speed over batch processing, enabling quick queries and responses.

      Lambda architecture batch processes large quantities of data, enabling a complete analysis, though with some latency.


    2. Blob storage by default is general purpose, but it can be set to one of three specific roles?

      Append blobs, Big blobs, Data Lake storage

      Append blobs, Block blobs, Hot blobs

      Append blobs, Cosmos DB blobs, Data lake blobs

      Append blobs, Page blobs, Block blobs
